nodes.text: The Zug system, also known as the Aargau system, was a ten-planet star system located in the Core Worlds region of the galaxy. It contained the banking planet of Aargau, as well as the gas giants Laazrau, Zauhu, Urazuun, and Faargau. The Z-Gomot Ternbuell Guppat Corporation was based in the system.
